channel.title: job on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in job on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-03
item.description: Apple developing new external display that’s around half the price of the Pro Display XDR (2 minute read) Apple may be preparing to launch a new external display this year.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-26
item.description: How Riot used tech from The Mandalorian to build Worlds’ astonishing mixed reality stage (4 minute read) As the pandemic goes on, events such as the annual League of Legends World Championship have to find creative ways to bring the show to the audience.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-08
item.description: Minecraft is coming to PlayStation VR as a free upgrade later this month (1 minute read) Minecraft will be playable for free on PlayStation VR later this month.
